channel.title: Testscape Level Error
channel.description: The maximum total level for testscape is 1980. (real runescape). Anyone know how to make it 4200? (200 every skill)

item.title: Testscape Level Error
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Go in client.java and search for for (int lvl = 1
and change

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 99;

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 200;
Then save and compile and it will work!

Read full topic
